## ColorUtils.getHexFromHsl() function

Encode and convert HSL value to number coded color format (0xRRGGBB).

 getHexFromRgb.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getHexFromHsl(h: number, s: number, l: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  h | number | Hue component value between 0 and 1. |
|  s | number | Saturation value between 0 and 1. |
|  l | number | Lightness channel between 0 and 1. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
